Description: The businessman talks to us about the importance of financial education and how we can start investing
Title: Darren Weeks started investing in the Stock Market at age 10 Here are some tips from the 'Canadian Rich Dad'
Author: Mar a Arcia

Description: The No PFAS in Cosmetics Act will be introduced in the US House and Senate on Tuesday following the release of a new study that found high levels of a marker for toxic PFAS substances in 52 of 231 makeup products purchased in the United States and Canada
Title: Makeup may contain potentially toxic chemicals, study finds
Author: Sandee LaMotte, CNN

Description: Hamilton and other hit Broadway productions are coming to Vancouver Listed Daily Hive Broadway shows 'Hamilton,' 'Anastasia' and others coming to Vancouver stage Maple Ridge News Maple Ridge News Hamilton coming to Ottawa as
Title: Hamilton and other hit Broadway productions are coming to Vancouver Listed Daily Hive
Author: Amir Ali

Description: Crowds gathered outside a Hong Kong court early on Saturday ahead of a hearing for two executives of pro democracy newspaper Apple Daily charged under the city's sweeping national security law, in a case that has drawn international condemnation
Title: Crowds gather for hearing of two Apple Daily executives on national security charge Reuters Canada
Author: Jessie Pang

Description: Austrian online tutoring startup GoStudent has raised 205 million euros ( 244 million) in new funding to reach a valuation of 1 4 billion euros, it said on Tuesday, as the business benefits from the pandemic induced explosion in remote learning
Title: Austrian online tutoring startup GoStudent gains valuation boost Reuters
Author: Reuters Staff
